ComicInfo.Summary:
The identity of young Daniel's mysterious abductor is revealed, and Lyta receives some news that sends her down a dark path that will have dire consequences for the Dreaming! "The Kindly Ones" part 3.
Loki and Puck are the kidnappers of Daniel Hall, and they put him in to the fire to break his powers. Meanwhile Dream has an encounter with the Hobgoblin and the police tells Lyta that Daniel is dead.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-08-06 16:33:34. [CVDB38901]
